__e: Look, I'm an experienced man and I'm trying to understand where the truth is...
She's not very experienced, and she shouldn't be here right now.
OK, I'm getting on but I'm experienced, and I know the game
And... you're way more experience than I am, hence your daughter;
And if you'd prefer a real woman, a woman with experience, who knows what a man is, and what he likes in bed and out of bed... then... I... can provide it all, and all at once, if you wish.
I'm not saying you're old, it's just you've got a bit more about you than most people.
I'm only a young girl, new to the ways of war, but perhaps a seasoned captain like yourself can explain to me how you propose to defeat us.
I'm not as experienced as some, but more than others.
Huh? He's just not as experienced as I am, that's all.
Once you leave, I'm heading back to his compound and I'm getting intel on every deal he's ever done.
I'm no art expert, but it seems to me that whoever did these is someone who really... loves... blood.
Yeah, with a big, fine, new young wife...
